thread.title: Isaiah Thomas wanted nothing to do with a Giannis Antetokounmpo jump ball
thread.title_full: Isaiah Thomas wanted nothing to do with a Giannis Antetokounmpo jump ball

author: Whitney Medworth
title: Isaiah Thomas wanted nothing to do with a Giannis Antetokounmpo jump ball
text:
NOPE.
The Celtics and Bucks faced off on Wednesday night in Boston and we saw one of the most lopsided jump balls ever in the NBA. You may have thought that scrappy Isaiah Thomas would try and steal this jump ball from Giannis Antetokounmpo but he had zero interest. He didn’t even try, just backed away instead.
Antetokounmpo is 6’11 while Thomas is only 5’9, so there wasn’t much of a chance here for Thomas anyway.
